title: Ep. 179 - Crash Landing On You (Ep 1) with Lo and Kate Clayborn!
itunes:title: Ep. 179 - Crash Landing On You (Ep 1) with Lo and Kate Clayborn!
description:
Whoooaaaa! Lo of Christina Lauren and Kate Clayborn stopped by to introduce us to our brand new obsession, Crash Landing On You! This K-drama has already bewitched our minds and stolen our souls. Come with us as we recap episode one! We’ll be recapping the rest of the episode, one by one, on our Patreon! 
 Plus, we chat all about Kate’s new release LOVE AT FIRST. Mel loved it! 
 Bonus Content: Is this a retelling of Wizard of Oz? There was that time we didn’t realize Icecapade was a Christmas Carol retelling, husbands hear everything, especially when you’re stealing their m&ms, Erin’s new theory that tornadoes can use shovels and bury mines, the appeal of TALL men for Kate, helmets are such a buzzkill, and so much more! 
 Self Love Recommendations Erin: cauldron mugs from etsy! Kate: my houseplants! Lo: get your friends book birthday flowers, but accidentally send them to yourself! Melody: get your friends surprise gifts without telling them! 
 Follow Kate @kateclayborn and Christina Lauren @ChristinaLauren!
 Episode Sponsors: 
  TALK DIRTY TO ME by Imogen Keeper. It’s a romantic suspense with a hitman (grumpy) and a writer (sunshine) that is HOT HOT HOT and keeps you on the edge of your seat! 
 The podcast COMA GIRL by Stephanie Bond. In this daily podcast, the victim of a tragic event lies in a hospital bed, at the mercy of friends and relatives who think she can't hear them. But she SO can. Get it anywhere you listen to podcasts!
 Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
 Get more content on PATREON
 MERCH! Teepublic, https://chicalookate.myshopify.com/collections/heaving-bosom (Chicaloo Kate), Redbubble
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
  Facebook
 Patreon Shout Out: 
 Kendall HO, you are a Chalkydri, an ancient Greek angel who is mesmerizing to behold that you cannot look directly at it because you will be so enchanted and go insane. You are said to be all the colors of the rainbow, have the head of an alligator, and the feet and tails of a lion. You live near the Sun and announce the new day to all the other birds and flying creatures each day. Isn't that nice? Like a beautiful, gentle alarm clock of light and love. Thank you for all that you do.
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
July 2022 Bonkers Book Club! 
Join the Temple of Defiant Joy! July 2022 is offering you: the box set of Nicola Davidson's Surrey SFS series, Brutal Prince by Sophie Lark, and AUDIOBOOK Obsession by K. Lorrainne and Meg Anne, duet narration performed by Stella Hunter, Shane East, Aaron Shedlock, JF Harding, Jason Clarke, and James Joseph.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/bbc (Bonkers Book Club!)

Whoooaaaa! Lo of Christina Lauren and Kate Clayborn stopped by to introduce us to our brand new obsession, Crash Landing On You! This K-drama has already bewitched our minds and stolen our souls. Come with us as we recap episode one! We’ll be recapping the rest of the episode, one by one, on our Patreon! 

Plus, we chat all about Kate’s new release LOVE AT FIRST. Mel loved it! 

Bonus Content: Is this a retelling of Wizard of Oz? The podcast COMA GIRL by Stephanie Bond. In this daily podcast, the victim of a tragic event lies in a hospital bed, at the mercy of friends and relatives who think she can't hear them. But she SO can. Get it anywhere you listen to podcasts!
